meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Lauren Kostas David Bitkower Ron Ellison Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #4135.

div.div:
Last game of Season 18.
(Sarah: If you like San Francisco, we've got a treat for you. Stay tuned for Jeopardy!)

td.p: Lauren Kostas, a management consultant from Chicago, Illinois
David Bitkower, a judicial law clerk from New York, New York
Ron Ellison, a graduate student from Yardley, Pennsylvania (whose 1-day cash winnings total $23,962)

tr.td: (Alex: It's all about the Grand Canyon shows which will be airing on the History Channel very soon.)
ACTRESSES
CONTAINERS
FAIRY TALES
20th CENTURY BUSINESS
COLOR MY WORLD

div.onmouseout:
toggle('clue_J_1_1', 'clue_J_1_1_stuck', 'Hard working but sterile creatures seen here

"At first the miners used them to pack in and out.
When the miners turned to tourism, they discovered it was the best way to show the canyon."')

a.title: Suggest a correction for this clue

tr.td:
Hard working but sterile creatures seen here
"At first the miners used them to pack in and out.
When the miners turned to tourism, they discovered it was the best way to show the canyon."

toggle('clue_J_2_2', 'clue_J_2_2_stuck', '(Ron: What is [*]?)

(Ron: It\'s my favorite show.)
(Alex: It is? Okay! It\'s the luck of the draw, and it worked out. Aren\'t you sorry you didn\'t risk more?)

General Hospital

Ron
')

---
(Alex: [*] is right, and I\'m glad you came up with that correct response, because a few moments ago, in error, I went to David and got him to make the selection instead of you. So we\'re back on track, Ron.

a portfolio

RonDavid
')

white

RonLauren
')

div.h3: Scores at the first commercial break (after clue 15):

tr.td: Ron
David
Lauren

div.h3: Scores at the end of the Jeopardy! Round:

tr.td: Ron
David
Lauren
(Alex: Since this is the last show of our 18th season, we're going to have...)
SEASON FINALES
IT'S BEEN FUN
SO LONG
BE WELL
TAKE IT "EZ"
(Alex: "E-Z" will appear in each correct response.)
WE'RE NOT GOING FAR
(Alex: ...because throughout the summer, you, the viewers, will be enjoying some of our tournaments from this past season.)

div.h3: Scores at the end of the Double Jeopardy! Round:

tr.td: Ron
David
Lauren

div.onmouseover:
toggle('clue_FJ', 'clue_FJ_stuck', '(Alex: The reference to "under this roof" applied, of course, to the White House, so it was probably said by a President, and let\'s hope you were going down that road. And Ron is shaking his head. He did not go down that road. He went gently into what?)
...
(Alex: [To Lauren] Nope, not in 1800.)
...
(Alex: No, the correct response, Who is [*], as he was moving into the White House.)
RonWho is O.wHolmes
$4,000
LaurenWho is John George Washington?
$3,601
DavidWho is Cotton Mather??
$4,201
John Adams')
div.onmouseout: toggle('clue_FJ', 'clue_FJ_stuck', '"May none but honest and wise men ever rule under this roof" is from this man\'s 1800 prayer')

tr.td: FAMOUS AMERICANS
"May none but honest and wise men ever rule under this roof" is from this man's 1800 prayer
Ron
David
Lauren
3rd place: $1,000
New champion: $9,599
2nd place: $2,000
Ron
David
Lauren

20 R
(including 1 DD),
3 W
(including 2 DDs)

body.div: The J! Archive is created by fans, for fans. The Jeopardy! game show and all elements thereof, including but not limited to copyright and trademark thereto, are the property of Jeopardy Productions, Inc. and are protected under law.
